channel.title: Will Someone do my math homework? (reward)
channel.description:
Well I dont know how to/dont feel like doing my homework so I was wondering if someone here will do it for me. Whoever does it will get a reward of $2.20 on paypal.
Show All Your Work
Here is my homework -
23-46

item.title: Will Someone do my math homework? (reward)

@Mr.Chris wrote:

By the looks of it, you’re studying for your maths GCSEs this year. I suggest you learn this.

item.title: Will Someone do my math homework? (reward)
item.dc:creator: @aznph8playa aznph8playa
item.description:
@aznph8playa wrote:

Products of Sum and Difference:
(A-B)(A+B) = A[sup]2[/sup]-B[sup]2[/sup]
Example:
23. (x+5)(x-5) = x[sup]2[/sup]-5[sup]2[/sup]=x[sup]2[/sup]-25

Square of a Binomial:
(A+B)[sup]2[/sup] = A[sup]2[/sup]+2AB+B[sup]2[/sup]
(A-B)[sup]2[/sup] = A[sup]2[/sup]-2AB+B[sup]2[/sup]
Examples:
29. (x+5)[sup]2[/sup] = x[sup]2[/sup]+2x5+5[sup]2[/sup] = x[sup]2[/sup]+10x+25
32. (2y-4)[sup]2[/sup] = (2y)[sup]2[/sup]-2*(2y)*(4)+4[sup]2[/sup] = 4y[sup]2[/sup]-16y+16

Compensation is not necessary, but in general, you’re better off if you can actually learn the material.

Read full topic
item.source: Will Someone do my math homework? (reward)
